keyMappings:
map a Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map A createTab
unmap <a-f>
map s toggleViewSource
map S LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map ) nextTab
map ( previousTab
map } moveTabLeft
map } moveTabRight
map 0 firstTab
map $ lastTab
map w duplicateTab
map U restoreTab
map i scrollPageDown
map h goBack
map l goForward
map H scrollLeft
map L scrollRight
